00053     public Liquibase(String changeLogFile, FileOpener fileOpener, Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00054         this(changeLogFile, fileOpener, DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(conn));
00055     }
00056 
00057     public Liquibase(String changeLogFile, FileOpener fileOpener, Database database) {
00058         log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00059 
00060         if (changeLogFile != null) {
00061             this.changeLogFile = changeLogFile.replace('\\', '/');  //convert to standard / if usign absolute path on windows
00062         }
00063         this.fileOpener = fileOpener;
00064 
00065         this.database = database;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public Database getDatabase() {
00069         return database;
00070     }
00071 
00075     public FileOpener getFileOpener() {
00076         return fileOpener;
00077     }
00078 
00083     public void setCurrentDateTimeFunction(String currentDateTimeFunction) {
00084         if (currentDateTimeFunction != null) {
00085             this.database.setCurrentDateTimeFunction(currentDateTimeFunction);
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     public Object getChangeLogParameterValue(String paramter) {
00090         return changeLogParameters.get(paramter);
00091     }
00092 
00093     public void setChangeLogParameterValue(String paramter, Object value) {
00094         if (!changeLogParameters.containsKey(paramter)) {
00095             changeLogParameters.put(paramter, value);
00096         }
00097     }
00098 
00099     public void update(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00100 
00101         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00102         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00103 
00104         try {
00105             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00106 
00107             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00108             changeLog.validate(database);
00109             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00110                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00111                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00112                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00113 
00114             logIterator.run(new UpdateVisitor(database), database);
00115         } catch (LiquibaseException e) {
00116             throw e;
00117         } finally {
00118             try {
00119                 lockHandler.releaseLock();
00120             } catch (LockException e) {
00121                 log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Could not release lock", e);
00122             }
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     public void update(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00127         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00128         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00129         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00130 
00131         outputHeader("Update Database Script");
00132 
00133         update(contexts);
00134 
00135         try {
00136             output.flush();
00137         } catch (IOException e) {
00138             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00139         }
00140 
00141         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00142     }
00143 
00144     public void update(int changesToApply, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00145 
00146         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00147         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00148 
00149         try {
00150             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00151 
00152             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00153             changeLog.validate(database);
00154 
00155             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00156                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00157                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00158                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database),
00159                     new CountChangeSetFilter(changesToApply));
00160 
00161             logIterator.run(new UpdateVisitor(database), database);
00162         } finally {
00163             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00164         }
00165     }

00167     public void update(int changesToApply, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00168         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00169         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00170         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00171 
00172         outputHeader("Update "+changesToApply+" Change Sets Database Script");
00173 
00174         update(changesToApply, contexts);
00175 
00176         try {
00177             output.flush();
00178         } catch (IOException e) {
00179             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00180         }
00181 
00182         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00183     }
00184 
00185     private void outputHeader(String message) throws JDBCException {
00186         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************");
00187         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment(message);
00188         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************");
00189         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Change Log: " + changeLogFile);
00190         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Ran at: " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(new Date()));
00191         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("Against: " + getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00192         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("LiquiBase version: " + LiquibaseUtil.getBuildVersion());
00193         database.getJdbcTemplate().comment("*********************************************************************" + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00194     }
00195 
00196     public void rollback(int changesToRollback, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00197         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00198         database.setJdbcTemplate(new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database));
00199 
00200         outputHeader("Rollback " + changesToRollback + " Change(s) Script");
00201 
00202         rollback(changesToRollback, contexts);
00203 
00204         try {
00205             output.flush();
00206         } catch (IOException e) {
00207             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00208         }
00209         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00210     }
00211 
00212     public void rollback(int changesToRollback, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00213         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00214         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00215 
00216         try {
00217             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00218 
00219             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00220             changeLog.validate(database);
00221 
00222             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00223                     new AlreadyRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00224                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00225                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database),
00226                     new CountChangeSetFilter(changesToRollback));
00227 
00228             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database), database);
00229         } finally {
00230             try {
00231                 lockHandler.releaseLock();
00232             } catch (LockException e) {
00233                 log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error releasing lock", e);
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237 
00238     public void rollback(String tagToRollBackTo, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00239         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00240         database.setJdbcTemplate(new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database));
00241 
00242         outputHeader("Rollback to '" + tagToRollBackTo + "' Script");
00243 
00244         rollback(tagToRollBackTo, contexts);
00245 
00246         try {
00247             output.flush();
00248         } catch (IOException e) {
00249             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00250         }
00251         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00252     }

00254     public void rollback(String tagToRollBackTo, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00255         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00256         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00257 
00258         try {
00259             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00260 
00261             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00262             changeLog.validate(database);
00263             
00264             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00265                     new AfterTagChangeSetFilter(tagToRollBackTo, database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00266                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00267                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00268 
00269             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database), database);
00270         } finally {
00271             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00272         }
00273     }

00275     public void rollback(Date dateToRollBackTo, String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {

00278 
00279         outputHeader("Rollback to " + dateToRollBackTo + " Script");
00280 
00281         rollback(dateToRollBackTo, contexts);
00282 
00283         try {
00284             output.flush();

00286             throw new LiquibaseException(e);

00288         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);

00291     public void rollback(Date dateToRollBackTo, String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00292         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00293         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00294 
00295         try {
00296             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00297 
00298             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00299             changeLog.validate(database);
00300             
00301             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00302                     new ExecutedAfterChangeSetFilter(dateToRollBackTo, database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00303                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00304                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00305 
00306             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database), database);
00307         } finally {
00308             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00309         }

00312     public void changeLogSync(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00313 
00314         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00315         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00316         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00317 
00318         outputHeader("SQL to add all changesets to database history table");
00319 
00320         changeLogSync(contexts);
00321 
00322         try {
00323             output.flush();
00324         } catch (IOException e) {
00325             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00326         }
00327 
00328         database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00329     }

00331     public void changeLogSync(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00332         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00333         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00334 
00335         try {
00336             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00337 
00338             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00339             changeLog.validate(database);
00340 
00341             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00342                     new NotRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00343                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00344                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00345 
00346             logIterator.run(new ChangeLogSyncVisitor(database), database);
00347         } finally {
00348             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00349         }
00350     }

00371     public void markNextChangeSetRan(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00372         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00373         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00374 
00375         try {
00376             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00377 
00378             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00379             changeLog.validate(database);
00380 
00381             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00382                     new NotRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00383                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00384                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database),
00385                     new CountChangeSetFilter(1));
00386 
00387             logIterator.run(new ChangeLogSyncVisitor(database), database);
00388         } finally {
00389             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00390         }
00391     }

00393     public void futureRollbackSQL(String contexts, Writer output) throws LiquibaseException {
00394         JdbcOutputTemplate outputTemplate = new JdbcOutputTemplate(output, database);
00395         JdbcTemplate oldTemplate = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00396         database.setJdbcTemplate(outputTemplate);
00397 
00398         outputHeader("SQL to roll back currently unexecuted changes");
00399 
00400         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00401         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00402 
00403         try {
00404             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00405 
00406             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00407             changeLog.validate(database);
00408 
00409             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00410                     new NotRanChangeSetFilter(database.getRanChangeSetList()),
00411                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00412                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00413 
00414             logIterator.run(new RollbackVisitor(database), database);
00415         } finally {
00416             database.setJdbcTemplate(oldTemplate);
00417             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00418         }
00419 
00420         try {
00421             output.flush();
00422         } catch (IOException e) {
00423             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00424         }
00425 
00426     }
00427 
00431     public final void dropAll() throws JDBCException, LockException {
00432         dropAll(getDatabase().getDefaultSchemaName());
00433     }
00434 
00438     public final void dropAll(String... schemas) throws JDBCException {
00439         try {
00440             LockHandler.getInstance(database).waitForLock();
00441 
00442             for (String schema : schemas) {
00443                 log.info("Dropping Database Objects in schema: " + database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema));
00444                 checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00445                 getDatabase().dropDatabaseObjects(schema);
00446                 checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00447                 log.finest("Objects dropped successfully");
00448             }
00449         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00450             throw e;
00451         } catch (Exception e) {
00452             throw new JDBCException(e);
00453         } finally {
00454             try {
00455                 LockHandler.getInstance(database).releaseLock();
00456             } catch (LockException e) {
00457                 log.severe("Unable to release lock: " + e.getMessage());
00458             }
00459         }
00460     }

00465     public void tag(String tagString) throws JDBCException {
00466         getDatabase().tag(tagString);
00467     }

00470     public void checkDatabaseChangeLogTable() throws JDBCException {
00471         getDatabase().checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00472         getDatabase().checkDatabaseChangeLogLockTable();
00473     }
00474 
00481     public boolean isSafeToRunMigration() throws JDBCException {
00482         return !getDatabase().getJdbcTemplate().executesStatements() || getDatabase().getConnectionURL().indexOf("localhost") >= 0;
00483     }
00484 
00488     public DatabaseChangeLogLock[] listLocks() throws JDBCException, IOException, LockException {
00489         checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00490 
00491         return LockHandler.getInstance(getDatabase()).listLocks();
00492     }
00493 
00494     public void reportLocks(PrintStream out) throws LockException, IOException, JDBCException {
00495         DatabaseChangeLogLock[] locks = listLocks();
00496         out.println("Database change log locks for " + getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00497         if (locks.length == 0) {
00498             out.println(" - No locks");
00499         }
00500         for (DatabaseChangeLogLock lock : locks) {
00501             out.println(" - " + lock.getLockedBy() + " at " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(lock.getLockGranted()));
00502         }
00503 
00504     }
00505 
00506     public void forceReleaseLocks() throws LockException, IOException, JDBCException {
00507         checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00508 
00509         LockHandler.getInstance(getDatabase()).forceReleaseLock();
00510     }
00511 
00512     public List<ChangeSet> listUnrunChangeSets(String contexts) throws LiquibaseException {
00513         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00514         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00515 
00516         try {
00517             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00518 
00519             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00520             changeLog.validate(database);
00521 
00522             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00523                     new ShouldRunChangeSetFilter(database),
00524                     new ContextChangeSetFilter(contexts),
00525                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00526 
00527             ListVisitor visitor = new ListVisitor();
00528             logIterator.run(visitor, database);
00529             return visitor.getSeenChangeSets();
00530         } finally {
00531             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00532         }
00533     }
00534 
00535     public void reportStatus(boolean verbose, String contexts, Writer out) throws LiquibaseException {
00536         try {
00537             List<ChangeSet> unrunChangeSets = listUnrunChangeSets(contexts);
00538             out.append(String.valueOf(unrunChangeSets.size()));
00539             out.append(" change sets have not been applied to ");
00540             out.append(getDatabase().getConnectionUsername());
00541             out.append("@");
00542             out.append(getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00543             out.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00544             if (verbose) {
00545                 for (ChangeSet changeSet : unrunChangeSets) {
00546                     out.append("     ").append(changeSet.toString(false)).append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00547                 }
00548             }
00549 
00550             out.flush();
00551         } catch (IOException e) {
00552             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00553         }
00554 
00555     }
00556 
00560     public void clearCheckSums() throws LiquibaseException {
00561         log.info("Clearing database change log checksums");
00562         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00563         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00564 
00565         try {
00566             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00567 
00568             UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(getDatabase().getDefaultSchemaName(), getDatabase().getDatabaseChangeLogTableName());
00569             updateStatement.addNewColumnValue("MD5SUM", null);
00570             getDatabase().getJdbcTemplate().execute(updateStatement);
00571             getDatabase().commit();
00572         } finally {
00573             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00574         }
00575     }
00576 
00577     public void generateDocumentation(String outputDirectory) throws LiquibaseException {
00578         log.info("Generating Database Documentation");
00579         LockHandler lockHandler = LockHandler.getInstance(database);
00580         lockHandler.waitForLock();
00581 
00582         try {
00583             database.checkDatabaseChangeLogTable();
00584 
00585             DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00586             changeLog.validate(database);
00587 
00588             ChangeLogIterator logIterator = new ChangeLogIterator(changeLog,
00589                     new DbmsChangeSetFilter(database));
00590 
00591             DBDocVisitor visitor = new DBDocVisitor(database);
00592             logIterator.run(visitor, database);
00593 
00594             visitor.writeHTML(new File(outputDirectory), fileOpener);
00595         } catch (IOException e) {
00596             throw new LiquibaseException(e);
00597         } finally {
00598             lockHandler.releaseLock();
00599         }

00604 //            }

00608 //
00609 //            changeLogHandler.writeHTML(this);
00610 //        } finally {
00611 //            releaseLock();
00612 //        }
00613     }

00618     public void validate() throws LiquibaseException {
00619 
00620         DatabaseChangeLog changeLog = new ChangeLogParser(changeLogParameters).parse(changeLogFile, fileOpener);
00621         changeLog.validate(database);
00622     }
